key_risks: Class action lawsuits alleging misleading statements and failure to disclose critical information
Data security breaches due to lack of multifactor authentication
Dependence on third-party cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Unpredictable costs from consumption-based pricing model
Intense competition in the cloud data warehousing market
controversies: Multiple class action lawsuits related to misleading statements and security gaps
Data breaches affecting over 100 customers, including Ticketmaster
social_issues: Criticism for role in data breaches affecting consumer data security
governance_issues: Leadership changes with CEO transition in April 2023
